name: La Noche de Walpurgis
overview: The game is a weird mix of all kinds of genres. The first part is a horizontal shooter/platformer, while the second part is a point-and-click adventure which you need to find a solution to. Knowledge of Spanish language is not needed in the first part, but in the point-and-click adventure part, it is even mandatory, as the great part of hints will be given by speech only.
